name: Messari
title: Natix's Alireza Ghods on autonomous driving on Fully Diluted with Messari Research
text:
Synopsis
Autonomous driving companies require two critical components for success: computational power (through partnerships with companies like Nvidia) and comprehensive data collection, which currently present significant technological bottlenecks.

Key Insights
- Autonomous driving companies are facing challenges in two key areas: computing resources and data acquisition
- Nvidia is a top partner for computational infrastructure in the autonomous driving sector
- Companies in this space cannot effectively develop autonomous driving technology without solving these two critical components
- The current limitations in computing and data are creating bottlenecks for autonomous driving technology development
